




== Arch: Setup lxde/openbox themes ==
- install 'rave-x-colors' with yaourt.
- install 'arc-gtk-theme' with pacman.
- install lxappearance package and exec it to start configuring.
- install 'xcursor-flatbed' with pacman.
- select Arc-Dark on Widget(GTK Theme), and RAVE-X-Dark-Yellow on Icon Theme.
- select 'Flatbed Cursors original left-handed Orange' on Mouse Cursor.
- Leave WM Theme(openbox) with Onyx or Onyx-Citrus.
